divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching the Leonid meteor shower, and when I looked straight up I thoughtI saw a small flock of geese. It was quickly apparent that it was somethingelse, something I have never seen before! It was three glowing, triangularcraft, that seemed to be paused in flight. Imeadiately they moved ,in an everincreasing speed (with smooth acceleration) from straight up toward thenortheast. Their height appeared steady.
